response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and functionality. Given its unique features and the time and resources we've dedicated to its development, I believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $18,000. I trust that you will appreciate its value and make the most out of its capabilities. If you're interested in learning more about how this product can benefit you, please let me know, and we can schedule a detailed discussion. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 18000}
